author: Alucard648
info: Strike when it has specific face. Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: //Cycling ShapeshifterMoves in 4 directions. Vulnerable only during specific frame of animation.//Cycling Shapeshifter - Boss variantMoves in 4 directions. Vulnerable only during specific frame of animation. When it changes faces, it jumps and fires eweapon on landing.
setup: E.Anim - None, 2-frame, 3-frame or 4-frame, one row every 4 states.Attribute 1: Delay between changing faces.Attribute 2: Number of faces used by enemyAttribute 3: Tile WidthAttribute 4: Tile HeightAttribute 5: Target faceAttribute 6: Number of frames per faceAttribute 7: >0 - switch face every time enemy turns, ignoring attribute 1Attribute 8: >0 - use animation when switching faces, uses the same stup right below original animationAttribute 9: Sprite used for eweapons (boss only)Attribute 10: Eweapon speed boss only)
